Now_Showing.synopsis: In an innocent heartland city, five are shot dead by an expert sniper. The police quickly identify and arrest the culprit, and build a slam-dunk case. But the accused man claims he's innocent and says "Get Jack Reacher." Reacher himself sees the news report and turns up in the city. The defense is immensely relieved, but Reacher has come to bury the guy. Shocked at the accused's request, Reacher sets out to confirm for himself the absolute certainty of the man's guilt, but comes up with more than he bargained for.

Director Ang Lee creates a groundbreaking movie event about a young man who survives a disaster at sea and is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an amazing and unexpected connection with another survivor...a fearsome Bengal tiger.

In "Red Dawn," an American city awakens to the surreal sight of foreign paratroopers dropping from the sky � shockingly, the U.S. has been invaded and their hometown is the initial target. Quickly and without warning, the citizens find themselves prisoners and their town under enemy occupation. Determined to fight back, a group of young patriots seek refuge in the surrounding woods, training and reorganizing themselves into a guerilla group of fighters.
Now_Showing.cast: Chris Hemsworth, Josh Peck, Josh Hutcherson, Adrianne Palicki

Now_Showing.synopsis: In the story, Vice plays Bernice, a super successful “Lord of the Apparels Industry” who is determined to make miserable the lives of his closest competitors — Ai-Ai (Detty) as Bernice’s hard-working half-sister whose family refused to help Bernice’s family when they were poor; and Kris as Roselle, Bernice’s equally brilliant and talented yet eccentric business arch-nemesis. In her effort to secure her throne, Bernice is forced against her will to hire Detty as his 75th assistant, until things get out of hand when Detty becomes Roselle’s employee.
Now_Showing.cast: Kris Aquino, Vice Ganda, Ai-Ai Delas Alas

Now_Showing.synopsis: For a decade, an elite team of intelligence and military operatives, working in secret across the globe, devoted themselves to a single goal: to find and eliminate Osama bin Laden. Zero Dark Thirty reunites the Oscar winning team of director-producer Kathryn Bigelow and writer-producer Mark Boal (The Hurt Locker) for the story of history's greatest manhunt for the world's most dangerous man.
Now_Showing.cast: Joel Edgerton, Jason Clarke, Jessica Chastain

Now_Showing.synopsis: Director Ang Lee creates a groundbreaking movie event about a young man who survives a disaster at sea and is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an amazing and unexpected connection with another survivor...a fearsome Bengal tiger.

The defense is immensely relieved, but Reacher has come to bury the guy. Shocked at the accused's request, Reacher sets out to confirm for himself the absolute certainty of the man's guilt, but comes up with more than he bargained for.

Director Ang Lee creates a groundbreaking movie event about a young man who survives a disaster at sea and is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an amazing and unexpected connection with another survivor...a fearsome Bengal tiger.

Star Cinema's "One More Try", directed by Ruel S. Bayani is a story of a mother who will do anything and everything just to save her dying son. Grace, portrayed by Angel Locsin is forced to reconnect with her son's father, Edward, played by Dingdong Dantes. Together, they hold the elixir of life for their child - and the poison in the relationships they are desperately trying to keep.
Now_Showing.cast: Angel Locsin, Angelica Panganiban, Dingdong Dantes, Zanjoe Marudo

Quickly and without warning, the citizens find themselves prisoners and their town under enemy occupation. Determined to fight back, a group of young patriots seek refuge in the surrounding woods, training and reorganizing themselves into a guerilla group of fighters.

Now_Showing.cast: Kris Aquino, Vice Ganda, Ai-Ai Delas Alas

Now_Showing.synopsis: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey follows title character Bilbo Baggins, who is swept into an epic quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor, which was long ago conquered by the dragon Smaug. Approached out of the blue by the wizard Gandalf the Grey, Bilbo finds himself joining a company of thirteen dwarves led by the legendary warrior Thorin Oakenshield. Although their goal lies to the East and the wastelands of the Lonely Mountain, first they must escape the goblin tunnels, where Bilbo meets the creature that will change his life forever.
Now_Showing.cast: Martin Freeman, Ian McKellen, Richard Armitage, Andy Serkis

Now_Showing.synopsis: For a decade, an elite team of intelligence and military operatives, working in secret across the globe, devoted themselves to a single goal: to find and eliminate Osama bin Laden. Zero Dark Thirty reunites the Oscar winning team of director-producer Kathryn Bigelow and writer-producer Mark Boal (The Hurt Locker) for the story of history's greatest manhunt for the world's most dangerous man.
